message: Let's be fair, I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  It's a good starting point.
I'll give you a slightly better deal. You can have 60% and I'll take 40%.
I'm still willing to negotiate, but I need more than 60%.  How about 7000 for me and 3000 for you?
I'm not willing to give up too much more. How about 55% for you and 45% for me?
Let's compromise.  I'll take 65% and you can have 35%.  We're getting closer to a deal.
I'm not giving up yet. How about we split it 50/50 and end this?
